revision.text:
===Adjective=== Clear, effective
===Verb=== To make clear or effective

===Adjective=== Clear, effective
===Verb=== To make clear or effective
[[pl:Articulate]]

revision.comment: +cat heteronym, expand vastly, format, cleanup...needs pronunciation and more attn
revision.text:
==English== ===Adjective=== #[[clear]], [[effective]] #especially, [[speak]]ing in a clear or effective manner #:''She's a bright, '''articulate''' young woman.'' #able to [[bend]] or [[hinge]] at certain points or [[interval]]s #:''The robot arm was '''articulate''' in two directions.''
===Verb=== #To make clear or effective #to speak clearly; to [[enunciate]] #:''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' #to [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]] #:''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # to bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend #:''an articulated bus'' #{{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #:'''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.''
[[pl:Articulate]] [[Category:English heteronyms]]

==English== ===Pronunciation=== *{{audio|en-us-articulate-adj.ogg|Audio (US)}}
===Adjective=== #[[clear]], [[effective]] #especially, [[speak]]ing in a clear or effective manner #:''She's a bright, '''articulate''' young woman.'' #able to [[bend]] or [[hinge]] at certain points or [[interval]]s #:''The robot arm was '''articulate''' in two directions.''
===Pronunciation===
*{{audio|en-us-articulate-verb.ogg|Audio (US)}}
===Verb=== #To make clear or effective #to speak clearly; to [[enunciate]] #:''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' #to [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]] #:''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # to bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend #:''an articulated bus'' #{{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #:'''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.''
[[Category:English heteronyms]]
[[io:Articulate]] [[pl:Articulate]]

==English== ===Pronunciation===
*Adjective: **[[AHD]]: ärtĭ'kyələt **[[IPA]]: /ɑːˈtɪkjələt/ (''[[RP]]''), /ɑːrtɪkjələt/ (''US'') **[[SAMPA]]: /<tt>a:"tIkj@l@t</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkj@l@t</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-adj.ogg|Audio (US)}} *Verb: **AHD: ärtĭ'kyəlāt **IPA: /ɑːˈtɪkjəleɪt/ (''RP''), /ɑːrtɪkjəleɪt/ (''US'') **SAMPA: /<tt>a:"tIkj@leIt</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkj@leIt</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-verb.ogg|Audio (US)}}
===Adjective=== #[[clear]], [[effective]] #especially, [[speak]]ing in a clear or effective manner #:''She's a bright, '''articulate''' young woman.'' #able to [[bend]] or [[hinge]] at certain points or [[interval]]s #:''The robot arm was '''articulate''' in two directions.''
===Transitive verb=== #To make clear or effective #to speak clearly; to [[enunciate]] #:''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' #to [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]] #:''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # to bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend #:''an articulated bus'' #{{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #:'''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.''
[[Category:English heteronyms]]
[[io:Articulate]] [[pl:Articulate]]

==English== ===Pronunciation===
*Adjective: **[[AHD]]: ärtĭ'kyələt **[[IPA]]: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊlət/ (''[[RP]]''), /ɑːrtɪkjələt/ (''US'') **[[SAMPA]]: /<tt>a:"tIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-adj.ogg|Audio (US)}} *Verb: **AHD: ärtĭ'kyəlāt **IPA: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊleɪt/ (''RP''), /ɑːrtɪkjəleɪt/ (''US'') **SAMPA: /<tt>a:"tIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-verb.ogg|Audio (US)}}

[[io:Articulate]] [[pl:Articulate]]

==English== ===Pronunciation===
*Adjective: **[[AHD]]: ärtĭ'kyələt **[[IPA]]: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊlət/ (''[[RP]]''), /ɑːrtɪkjələt/ (''US'') **[[SAMPA]]: /<tt>a:"tIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-adj.ogg|Audio (US)}} *Verb: **AHD: ärtĭ'kyəlāt **IPA: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊleɪt/ (''RP''), /ɑːrtɪkjəleɪt/ (''US'') **SAMPA: /<tt>a:"tIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-verb.ogg|Audio (US)}}

===Transitive verb=== #To make clear or effective #to speak clearly; to [[enunciate]] #:''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' #to [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]] #:''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # to bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend #:''an articulated bus'' #{{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #:'''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.''
[[Category:English heteronyms]]
[[io:Articulate]] [[pl:articulate]]

==English==
===Pronunciation===
*Adjective: **[[AHD]]: ärtĭ'kyələt **[[IPA]]: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊlət/ (''[[RP]]''), /ɑːrtɪkjələt/ (''US'') **[[SAMPA]]: /<tt>a:"tIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-adj.ogg|Audio (US)}} *Verb: **AHD: ärtĭ'kyəlāt **IPA: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊleɪt/ (''RP''), /ɑːrtɪkjəleɪt/ (''US'') **SAMPA: /<tt>a:"tIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-verb.ogg|Audio (US)}}
===Adjective=== '''articulate''' # [[clear]], [[effective]] # especially, [[speak]]ing in a clear or effective manner #: ''She's a bright, '''articulate''' young woman.'' # able to [[bend]] or [[hinge]] at certain points or [[interval]]s #: ''The robot arm was '''articulate''' in two directions.''
===Transitive verb=== {{en-infl-reg-other-e|articulat|e}} # To make clear or effective. # To speak clearly; to [[enunciate]]. #: ''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' # To [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]]. #: ''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # To bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend. #: ''an '''articulated''' bus'' # {{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #: '''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.''
[[Category:English heteronyms]]
[[io:Articulate]] [[pl:articulate]]

==English==
===Pronunciation===
*Adjective: **[[AHD]]: ärtĭ'kyələt **[[IPA]]: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊlət/ (''[[RP]]''), /ɑːrtɪkjələt/ (''US'') **[[SAMPA]]: /<tt>a:"tIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-adj.ogg|Audio (US)}} *Verb: **AHD: ärtĭ'kyəlāt **IPA: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊleɪt/ (''RP''), /ɑːrtɪkjəleɪt/ (''US'') **SAMPA: /<tt>a:"tIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-verb.ogg|Audio (US)}}

===Transitive verb=== {{en-infl-reg-other-e|articulat|e}} # To make clear or effective. # To speak clearly; to [[enunciate]]. #: ''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' # To [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]]. #: ''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # To bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend. #: ''an '''articulated''' bus'' # {{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #: '''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.''

# To make clear or effective. # To speak clearly; to [[enunciate]]. #: ''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' # To [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]]. #: ''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # To bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend. #: ''an '''articulated''' bus'' # {{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #: '''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.''

==English==
===Pronunciation=== *Adjective: **[[AHD]]: ärtĭ'kyələt **[[IPA]]: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊlət/ (''[[RP]]''), /ɑːrtɪkjələt/ (''US'') **[[SAMPA]]: /<tt>a:"tIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-adj.ogg|Audio (US)}} *Verb: **AHD: ärtĭ'kyəlāt **IPA: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊleɪt/ (''RP''), /ɑːrtɪkjəleɪt/ (''US'') **SAMPA: /<tt>a:"tIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-verb.ogg|Audio (US)}}
===Adjective=== '''articulate''' # [[clear]], [[effective]] # especially, [[speak]]ing in a clear or effective manner #: ''She's a bright, '''articulate''' young woman.'' # able to [[bend]] or [[hinge]] at certain points or [[interval]]s #: ''The robot arm was '''articulate''' in two directions.''
====Translations==== *[[w:Dutch language|Dutch]]: [[welbespraakt]]
===Transitive verb=== {{en-infl-reg-other-e|articulat|e}}
# To make clear or effective. # To speak clearly; to [[enunciate]]. #: ''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' # To [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]]. #: ''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # To bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend. #: ''an '''articulated''' bus'' # {{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #: '''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.'' # {{Anat.}} to form a joint or connect by joints #: ''The lower jaw '''articulates''' with the scull at the temporomandibular joint.''
[[Category:English heteronyms]]

==English==
===Pronunciation=== *Adjective: **[[AHD]]: ärtĭ'kyələt **[[IPA]]: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊlət/ (''[[RP]]''), /ɑːrtɪkjələt/ (''US'') **[[SAMPA]]: /<tt>a:"tIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUl@t</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-adj.ogg|Audio (US)}} *Verb: **AHD: ärtĭ'kyəlāt **IPA: /ɑːˈtɪkjʊleɪt/ (''RP''), /ɑːrtɪkjəleɪt/ (''US'') **SAMPA: /<tt>a:"tIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''RP''), /<tt>a:rtIkjUleIt</tt>/ (''US'') **{{audio|en-us-articulate-verb.ogg|Audio (US)}}

===Transitive verb=== {{en-infl-reg-other-e|articulat|e}}
# To make clear or effective. # To speak clearly; to [[enunciate]]. #: ''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' # To [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]]. #: ''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # To bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend. #: ''an '''articulated''' bus'' # {{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #: '''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.'' # {{Anat.}} to form a joint or connect by joints #: ''The lower jaw '''articulates''' with the scull at the temporomandibular joint.''

====Translations==== *[[w:Dutch language|Dutch]]: [[welbespraakt]]
===Transitive verb=== {{en-infl-reg-other-e|articulat|e}}
# To make clear or effective. # To speak clearly; to [[enunciate]]. #: ''I wish he'd '''articulate''' his words more clearly.'' # To [[explain]]; to put into words; to make something [[specific]]. #: ''I like this painting, but I can't '''articulate''' why.'' # To bend or hinge something at intervals, or to allow or build something so that it can bend. #: ''an '''articulated''' bus'' # {{music}} to [[attack]] a [[note]], as by [[tonguing]], [[slur]]ring, [[bow]]ing, etc. #: '''''Articulate''' that passage heavily.'' # {{Anat.}} to form a joint or connect by joints #: ''The lower jaw '''articulates''' with the scull at the temporomandibular joint.''
[[Category:English heteronyms]]
====Translations==== *{{de}}: [[zusammenhängen]] *{{fr}}: [[articuler]] *{{io}}: [[artikular]]
[[fr:articulate]] [[io:Articulate]] [[pl:articulate]]
